name: Momio Better Emojis
description:
Momios emojis don't look really nice because of the black color and small details. With this theme, the emojis are replaced with better normal colored and recognizable emojis.


UPDATE-INFORMATION
-- September 25, 2021: I updated the style and now it works again! --

-- November 18, 2020: Today momio replaced the emojis with even uglier ones, which is why this replacement no longer worked. now it works again! --
additional_info:
Version 3 - September 25, 2021
Version 2 - November 18, 2020
Version 1 - November 6, 2020

for https://www.momio.me
